cleaned_text: What is Ayurvedic Medicine? Ayurvedic medicine, or Ayurveda, is the traditional Indian medicine based on the concept of balance in bodily systems. Ayurveda, is a holistic medicine that uses herb based combinations, detoxification techniques, nutrition and lifestyle changes to address all kinds of medical conditions. The medical conditions that Ayurveda can treat and help with include: Rheumatoid arthritis Psoriasis Fertility Cancer palliative care Neurological and, Gynecological disorders Ayurveda is also very effective in the "rejuvenation" of the internal organs, as it addresses root causes of inflammation in the body, which cause both dysfunction and pre-mature ageing of the organism. In India, Ayurveda has an equivalent medical status to Western Allopathic medicine.
